name: Guardragon Shield
text: You can target 1 Dragon monster you control; it gains ATK/DEF equal to the total Link Rating of the Link Monsters currently on the field x 100, until the end of the opponent's turn. You can only use this effect of "Guardragon Shield" once per turn. Once per turn, if exactly 1 Dragon monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can send 1 Normal Monster from your hand or Deck to the GY instead.
